name: @bitloops/bl-transpiler
description: The one and only Bitloops Language transpiler

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && yarn copy-grammars
scripts.generate-parser-dts: rimraf src/parser/setup/grammar/Antler*.ts && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc src/parser/setup/grammar/Antler*js --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --allowJs --outDir src/parser/setup/grammar && node_modules/prettier/bin-prettier.js --config .prettierrc --write src/parser/setup/grammar/*.d.ts
scripts.generate-core-dts: rimraf src/parser/core/grammar/Bitloops*.ts && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc src/parser/core/grammar/Bitloops*js --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --allowJs --outDir src/parser/core/grammar && node_modules/prettier/bin-prettier.js --config .prettierrc --write src/parser/core/grammar/*.d.ts
scripts.generate-setup-dts: rimraf src/parser/setup/grammar/Bitloops*.ts && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc src/parser/setup/grammar/Bitloops*js --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --allowJs --outDir src/parser/setup/grammar && node_modules/prettier/bin-prettier.js --config .prettierrc --write src/parser/setup/grammar/*.d.ts
scripts.ant: java -jar /usr/local/lib/antlr-4.10.1-complete.jar -listener -visitor -Dlanguage=JavaScript src/parser/core/grammar/BitloopsLexer.g4 && java -jar /usr/local/lib/antlr-4.10.1-complete.jar -listener -visitor -Dlanguage=JavaScript src/parser/core/grammar/BitloopsParser.g4 && yarn generate-core-dts

author: Bitloops S.A.
